title: Halo by Derek Stenning
author: Derek Stenning
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Halo by Derek Stenning
text:
Skip to content
Issue 159 – December 2019Cover ArtHaloDerek Stenning is a concept artist working in the game development field. His personal work, Entartete Kunst (EK), is available as prints and resin model kits. His second art book, EK2 - The Lost Years, is to be published in 2022 by Design Studio Press.

 
 ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
